definition: system consisting of the parts of an engine through which burned gases or steam are discharged, wear out completely
details:
noun
- system consisting of the parts of an engine through which burned gases or steam are discharged
= synonyms: exhaust system
- gases ejected from an engine as waste products
= synonyms: exhaust fumes, fumes
verb
- wear out completely
= example: wear out completely
= synonyms: beat
- eliminate (a substance)
= example: eliminate (a substance)
= synonyms: release
- use up the whole supply of
= example: use up the whole supply of
- use up (resources or materials)
= synonyms: eat, wipe out, consume, eat up, use up, deplete, run through
- deplete
= example: deplete
= synonyms: sap
